alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Cold front to bring gusty winds to portions of northern Nevada this evening... A strong cold front is barreling through northern Nevada at this time. Windy to very windy conditions, along with scattered snow showers, have developed along the front. Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph are possible for the next two hours. This may accompany light snow showers, which when combined with snow on the ground, could produce reduced visibility to one mile or less. Look for the winds to diminish after 9pm this evening. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
